TopicTitle: Do you have a screenshot that makes you laugh every time?

Articles.Content:
In the midst of a seemingly normal batch of screenshots, this one makes me laugh every time I see it:

[![FtCxW7Wh.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/FtCxW7Wh.jpg)](http://i.imgur.com/FtCxW7W.jpg)

I know, there's just no accounting for taste. 

What about you? Is there a sneaky comedy shot in one of your collections?

The Razorback. I don't remember which version it's from, but it flew very well. Anmin Kerman may disagree. It makes me laugh, because I have no idea what I was thinking.

![xi57f67.png](http://i.imgur.com/xi57f67.png)

Is that Yves Kerman by chance?

Unfortunately, I never think to take a screenshot of spontaneous moments until it's too late.

![A9B2561688B1539A990FF4B80C72C065395CD9A8](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/28480866119120125/A9B2561688B1539A990FF4B80C72C065395CD9A8/)

It was at this moment Jeb hatched a brilliant plan.

Yes. Yes I do have an image that makes me laugh.

![34CF2E3E30C45EAE3C33B80FFF8B8E6384CB97BF](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/597012854154516876/34CF2E3E30C45EAE3C33B80FFF8B8E6384CB97BF/)

![pU1FrBr.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/pU1FrBr.jpg)

I have absolutely no idea what I was doing that day. The Kerbal's posture and the messed up landing gears get me every time.

![wvqnoFo.png](http://i.imgur.com/wvqnoFo.png)

I was actually practicing impromptu break dancing moves with my ship in this still photo. Spinning rapidly on my head at this particular moment (trying anything and everything to get back upright again).

I have a video?

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rOVB8myVapw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
![FvUfkSY.png](http://i.imgur.com/FvUfkSY.png)

> 
> I have a video?
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rOVB8myVapw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

How about this ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/wRXNQbomQNE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

@selfish\_meme, I like the vid! I'd like to suggest some background music: Z Z Top's La Grange.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Vppbdf-qtGU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

![screenshot3.jpg](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/78894495/screenshot3.jpg)

One of my Apollo style builds after failed launch but successful abort. This was from around 0.25 or so, the rocket fell victim to the limp noodle syndrome. The best part is that it spontaneously disassembled once that Kerbal (don't remember which one that was) got a little closer and the physics engine kicked in.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-03T23:44:12Z" title="06/03/2015 11:44  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 3, 2015</time> by Lord Aurelius**

It's not mine, but ...

![GtDtt2W.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/GtDtt2W.jpg)

This was supposed to be a test setup for aerodynamic forces and drag:

![O0x97aB.png](http://i.imgur.com/O0x97aB.png)

Alpha before we had reentry heat:

![oAdzIAR.png](http://i.imgur.com/oAdzIAR.png)

My all time favorite was the expression of my kerbalnaut when his Eve return vehicle ran out of fuel and he was on a suborbital trajectory:

![ehjgUPX.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ehjgUPX.jpg)

Praise the Kraken for EVA packs...

I think this screenshot is one of the best demonstrations of McQuack's Maxim: "Any crash you can walk away from counts as a landing."

![1798495_10152624908244735_1514817534089841737_n.jpg](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-oyNoLcAO1HQ/VLRol7zT1yI/AAAAAAAABS0/OW5Q5WCHn0Y/s800/1798495_10152624908244735_1514817534089841737_n.jpg)

Brace yourselves......

brrrroooooooooooffffiiiiiissstttt incoming!

![rCsUxuQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/rCsUxuQ.png)

![VPez9xD.png](http://i.imgur.com/VPez9xD.png)

![BndBihM.png](http://i.imgur.com/BndBihM.png)

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I made that for my company, "the FIST" XD

I dont exactly laugh, but this is probably my best one: 

![catastrophiexplosion.png](http://s10.postimg.org/e0jrbtc6f/catastrophiexplosion.png)
